About Monastiraki

Bustling flea market, street food, and lively atmosphere. Home to the famous Monastiraki Square with views of the Acropolis and ancient Agora.

VibrantMarketsNightlife
Best for: Shoppers, Foodies, Budget travelers

FAQs: Staying in Monastiraki

Is Monastiraki a good area to stay in Athens?

Yes! Monastiraki is bustling flea market, street food, and lively atmosphere. It's especially good for shoppers, foodies, budget travelers.

How far is Monastiraki from the Acropolis?

Monastiraki is 8-12 min walk from the Acropolis. Most hotels in Monastiraki are within easy walking distance of the Acropolis and other major attractions.

What's the average hotel price in Monastiraki?

Hotels in Monastiraki average around â‚¬120 per night. You can find options ranging from budget hostels to luxury hotels depending on your preferences.
